scripts.build: mkdir -p build/ && yarn run build:scss && yarn run build:css && yarn run build:html && yarn run build:assets
scripts.build:assets: mkdir -p build/ && cp src/static/*.png build/ & cp src/static/*.jpg build/ & cp src/static/*.ico build/ & cp src/static/*.pdf build/
scripts.build:css: mkdir -p build/ && postcss -u autoprefixer --autoprefixer.browsers 'last 2 version' -u css-mqpacker -u cssnano src/static/*.css -r
scripts.build:html: mkdir -p build/ && cp src/*.html build/ && for i in build/*.html;do inline-source --root ./src/static $i $i;done
scripts.build:scss: node-sass src/scss/ -o src/static && yarn run build:css
scripts.start: yarn run watch & yarn run server
scripts.watch: yarn run watch:assets & yarn run watch:scss & yarn run watch:html
